member.name: T:ANDOR_CS.Classes.AcquisitionSettings
member.summary: Represents all possible acuisition/camera settings that can be adjusted before taking any images

member.name: F:ANDOR_CS.Classes.AcquisitionSettings.camera
member.summary: A reference to the parent object. Used to perform checks of capabilities of the current camera.

member.name: P:ANDOR_CS.Classes.AcquisitionSettings.VSSpeed
member.summary: Stores the value of currently set vertical speed

member.name: P:ANDOR_CS.Classes.AcquisitionSettings.HSSpeed
member.summary: Stoers the value of currently set horizontal speed

member.name: P:ANDOR_CS.Classes.AcquisitionSettings.ADConverter
member.summary: Stores the index of currently set Analogue-Digital Converter and its bit depth.

member.name: P:ANDOR_CS.Classes.AcquisitionSettings.VSAmplitude
member.summary: Stores the value of currently set vertical clock voltage amplitude

member.name: P:ANDOR_CS.Classes.AcquisitionSettings.Amplifier
member.summary: Stores type of currentlt set Amplifier

member.name: P:ANDOR_CS.Classes.AcquisitionSettings.PreAmpGain
member.summary: Stores type of currently set PreAmp Gain

member.name: P:ANDOR_CS.Classes.AcquisitionSettings.AcquisitionMode
member.summary: Stores currently set acquisition mode

member.name: P:ANDOR_CS.Classes.AcquisitionSettings.ReadMode
member.summary: Stores currently set read mode

member.name: P:ANDOR_CS.Classes.AcquisitionSettings.TriggerMode
member.summary: Stores currently set trigger mode

member.name: P:ANDOR_CS.Classes.AcquisitionSettings.ExposureTime
member.summary: Stores exposure time

member.name: P:ANDOR_CS.Classes.AcquisitionSettings.ImageArea
member.summary: Stoers seleced image area - part of the CCD from where data should be collected

member.name: M:ANDOR_CS.Classes.AcquisitionSettings.#ctor(ANDOR_CS.Classes.Camera)
member.summary: Constructor adds reference to parent object.
member.param: Parent object. Camera, to which settings should be applied.

member.name: M:ANDOR_CS.Classes.AcquisitionSettings.CheckCamera(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Checks camera parent . If it is not initialized or active, throws exception.

member.name: M:ANDOR_CS.Classes.AcquisitionSettings.ApplySettings(System.@)
member.summary: Applys currenlty selected settings to the camera.
member.returns: Result of application of each non-null setting

member.name: M:ANDOR_CS.Classes.AcquisitionSettings.SetVSSpeed(System.Int32)
member.summary: Tries to set vertical speed. Camera may not be active.
member.param: Index of available speed that corresponds to VSpeed listed in .VSSpeeds

member.name: M:ANDOR_CS.Classes.AcquisitionSettings.SetVSSpeed
member.summary: Tries to set vertical speed to fastest recommended speed. Requires camera to be active.

member.name: M:ANDOR_CS.Classes.AcquisitionSettings.SetVSAmplitude(ANDOR_CS.Enums.VSAmplitude)
member.summary: Sets the vertical clock voltage amplitude (if camera supports it). Camera may be not active.

member.name: M:ANDOR_CS.Classes.AcquisitionSettings.SetADConverter(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets Analogue-Digital converter. Does not require camera to be active

member.name: M:ANDOR_CS.Classes.AcquisitionSettings.SetOutputAmplifier(ANDOR_CS.Enums.OutputAmplification)
member.summary: Sets output amplifier. Does not require camera to be active.

member.name: M:ANDOR_CS.Classes.AcquisitionSettings.GetAvailableHSSpeeds
member.summary: Returns a collection of available Horizonal Readout Speeds for currently selected Amplifier and AD Converter. Requires camera to be active. Note: amd should be set via and before calling this method.
member.returns: An enumerable collection of speed indexes and respective speed values available.

member.name: M:ANDOR_CS.Classes.AcquisitionSettings.SetHSSpeed(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets Horizontal Readout Speed for currently selected Amplifier and AD Converter. Requires camera to be active. Note: and should be set via and before calling this method.

member.name: M:ANDOR_CS.Classes.AcquisitionSettings.GetAvailablePreAmpGain
member.summary: Returns a collection of available PreAmp gains for currently selected HSSpeed, Amplifier, Converter. Requires camera to be active. Note: , and should be set via , and .

member.name: M:ANDOR_CS.Classes.AcquisitionSettings.SetPreAmpGain(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets PreAmp gain for currently selected HSSpeed, Amplifier, Converter. Requires camera to be active. Note: , and should be set via , and .

member.name: M:ANDOR_CS.Classes.AcquisitionSettings.SetAcquisitionMode(ANDOR_CS.Enums.AcquisitionMode)
member.summary: Sets acquisition mode. Camera may be inactive.

member.summary: Sets trigger mode. Camera may be inactive.

member.summary: Sets image area. Camera may be inactive.

member.name: T:ANDOR_CS.Classes.Camera
member.summary: Represents an instance of a Camera device

member.name: F:ANDOR_CS.Classes.Camera.isAcquiring
member.summary: Backend field. Indicates if acquisition is in progress. Volatile, atomic read/write.

member.name: F:ANDOR_CS.Classes.Camera.isInTemperatureCycle
member.summary: Backend field. Indicates if temperature cycle is in progress. Volatile, atomic read/write.

member.name: F:ANDOR_CS.Classes.Camera.isAsyncAcquisition
member.summary: Backend field. Indicates if acquisition is launched from async task. With async acquisition camera is able to properly fire all events. Volatile, atomic read/write.

member.name: F:ANDOR_CS.Classes.Camera.isAsyncTemperatureCycle
member.summary: Backend field. Indicates if temperature cycle is launched from async task. With async temperature cycle camera is able to properly fire all events. Volatile, atomic read/write.

member.name: P:ANDOR_CS.Classes.Camera.IsActive
member.summary: Indicates if this camera is currently active

member.name: P:ANDOR_CS.Classes.Camera.IsAcquiring
member.summary: Indicates if camera is in process of image acquisition.

member.name: P:ANDOR_CS.Classes.Camera.IsInTemperatureCycle
member.summary: Indicates of camera is in temperature cycle.

member.name: P:ANDOR_CS.Classes.Camera.IsAsyncAcquisition
member.summary: Indicates if acquisition is launched from async method and camera is able to properly fire all events.

member.name: P:ANDOR_CS.Classes.Camera.IsAsyncTemperatureCycle
member.summary: Indicates if temperature cycle is launched from async method and camera is able to properly fire all events.

member.summary: Handles all events related to acquisition of image process.

member.summary: Handles all events related to temperature cycle.

member.summary: Gets current status of the camera

member.name: M:ANDOR_CS.Classes.Camera.StartAcquisition
member.summary: Starts acquisition of the image. Does not block current thread. To monitor acquisition progress, use . Fires with = false. NOTE: this method is not recommended. Consider using async version . Async version allows to properly monitor acquisition progress.

member.name: M:ANDOR_CS.Classes.Camera.AbortAcquisition
member.summary: A synchronous way to manually abort acquisition. NOTE: if called while async acquisition is in progress, throws . To cancel async acquisition, use .

member.name: M:ANDOR_CS.Classes.Camera.GetAcquisitionSettingsTemplate
member.summary: Generates an instance of that can be used to select proper settings for image acquisition in the context of this camera
member.returns: A template that can be used to select proper acquisition settings

member.name: M:ANDOR_CS.Classes.Camera.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of Camera class to represent a connected Andor device. Maximum 8 cameras can be controled at the same time
member.param: The index of a camera (cannot exceed [0, 7] range). Usually limited by

member.name: M:ANDOR_CS.Classes.Camera.Dispose
member.summary: A realisation of method. Frees SDK-related resources

member.name: M:ANDOR_CS.Classes.Camera.StartAcquistionAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken,System.Int32)
member.summary: Starts process of acquisition asynchronously. This is the preferred way to acquire images from camera. To run synchronously, call i.e. on the returned task.
member.param: Cancellation token that can be used to abort process.
Time interval in ms between subsequent camera status queries.
member.returns: Task that can be queried for execution status.
